section.title: Viewing Hosts and Clusters
section.para: Access a tree view of the hosts and clusters for a provider from the Provider Summary.

procedure.title: To View Hosts and Clusters for a Provider

step.para: Click the provider to view the hosts and clusters.
Click on the Relationships accordion, then click Hosts & Clusters.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The hosts and clusters are displayed in a tree view. Hover over a host or virtual machines and its virtual thumbnail displays on the screen.
